cards.rules_text:
Haste
Whenever Burning Rebel attacks, it gets +X/+0 where X is the greatest power among attacking creatures you control.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
When Royal Escort enters, create a Weapon token and attach it to Royal Escort. [i](It's an artifact Equipment with “Equipped creature gets +1/+1” and “Equip {2}”.)[/i]

When Hilgarde Plunderer enters the battlefield, incite. [i](Exile the top card of your library face-up. At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, you may put an incited card you own into your hand.)[/i]
[i](Exile the top card of your library face-up. At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, you may put an incited card you own into your hand.)[/i]

Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, incite. [i](Exile the top card of your library face-up. At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, you may put an incited card you own into your hand.)[/i]
You may cast incited spells you own by discarding a card in addition to paying their other costs.

When Adept Blacksmith or another nontoken creature enters under your control, you may attach an unattached Weapon you control to it. If you control no unattached Weapons, create a Weapon token first. [i](It's an artifact Equipment with “Equipped creature gets +1/+1” and “Equip {2}”.)[/i]

Whenever Blackmarket Dealer or another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, if mana from a Treasure was spent to cast it, it gains haste until end of turn.
Whenever another creature you control dies, create a Treasure token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
